text: (Dutare) heliri; nannedege ilisikodalagiruva divya sandesadallantu tinnuvavana palige sava, hariyuttiruva rakta athava handiya mansada horatu â€“ berenannadaru tinnuvudakke nisedha heriruvudannu nanu kanuvudilla. Ekendare avu malina vastugalagive. Hageye allahana horatu bere yaradadaru hesaralli vadhisalada (athava bali nidalada) praniyu nisid'dhavagide. Ekendare adu papakrtyavagide. Istagiyu obba vyakti tira asahayakanagiddare mattu avanu avidheyanagali athava bandukoranagali alladiddare nim'ma odeyanantu khanditavagiyu apara ksamasilanu karunaluvu agiruvanu
